Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Jaime
Reviews.Content: This is a good cam with a really good zoomfor any one who wants to know  rtsp://ip:554/mpeg4 is the rtsp stream addressUnfortunately this cam works with active x controls and only works with ie under relaxed security controls.Took a bit of work but the video results are crystal clear and the zoom is nice and far, I can zoom in and read a license plate over 400 ft away so thats nice.Documentation is ok, but its easy enough to setup if you have some technical know how. just know that you have to turn some security settings off on IE to allow the active x control to be installed.Whats really holding this cam back is the streaming functions to devices other than IE. I use IP Cam viewer on android and the RTSP stream above, I think the stream is too large and the picture greys out alot. until i find a way to get the h264 stream I think it will continue to look this way. from time to time i can see the picture clearly, about every 3 to 5 seconds.On a wired computer the rtsp stream is in real time and clear
